### timevis
<https://daattali.com/shiny/timevis-demo/>

timevis lets you create rich and fully interactive timeline visualizations
based on the [vis.js](http://visjs.org/) Timeline library. 

```{r timevis}
library(timevis)
timevis(data = timevisData, groups = timevisDataGroups,
        options = list(editable = TRUE))
```
